original: @68b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @68b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra d'a ki yo gi ni s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: badzra d'a ki yo gi ni s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Vajraḍākinīyoginīsādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: Vajraḍākinī Yoginī Sādhana

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.

original: sku mdog rang bzhin rnam dag bde ba la spyod can //
analyzed: sku mdog rang bzhin rnam dag bde ba la spyod can //
translated: Whose body is pure by nature, enjoying bliss,

original: rnam par rtog pa bral bas phag mo'i zhal mnga' ba //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa bral bas phag mo'i zhal mnga' ba //
translated: Free from conceptualization, having the face of a sow.

original: btud de rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni rab bsgrub phyir //
analyzed: btud de rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni rab bsgrub phyir //
translated: Bowing to her, in order to accomplish Vajraḍākinī,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bde rnyed bshad par bya //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bde rnyed bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain the attainment of the bliss of coemergent wisdom.

original: sngags pa shes rab snying rjer ldan //
analyzed: sngags pa shes rab snying rjer ldan //
translated: The mantra practitioner, endowed with wisdom and compassion,

original: sa bon las ni rkyen gyis bskyed //
analyzed: sa bon las ni rkyen gyis bskyed //
translated: From the seed, produced by conditions,

original: myu gu rang gi lhar ldan pas //
analyzed: myu gu rang gi lhar ldan pas //
translated: The sprout, endowed with one's deity,

original: tshogs bsags 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: tshogs bsags 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to complete the result of gathering the accumulations,

original: dkyil 'khor chang gis byugs nas kyang //🔽rang byung me tog thig le dgod //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chang gis byugs nas kyang // rang byung me tog thig le dgod //
translated: Having anointed the maṇḍala with liquor,🔽Arrange the self-arisen flower bindu.

original: bskus pa'i me tog sngon po dgram //
analyzed: bskus pa'i me tog sngon po dgram //
translated: Arrange the anointed blue flower,

original: phyag sogs bdag gis ci nus bya //
analyzed: phyag sogs bdag gis ci nus bya //
translated: Do whatever prostrations and so forth one can.

original: dang po byams pa bsgom bya ste //
analyzed: dang po byams pa bsgom bya ste //
translated: First one should cultivate loving kindness,

original: gnyis pa snying rje'i rnam pa bsgom //🔽gsum pa dga' ba bsgom bya ste //
analyzed: gnyis pa snying rje'i rnam pa bsgom // gsum pa dga' ba bsgom bya ste //
translated: secondly one should cultivate compassion,🔽thirdly one should cultivate joy,

original: gsum gyi tha ma btang snyoms so //
analyzed: gsum gyi tha ma btang snyoms so //
translated: and fourthly one should cultivate equanimity.

original: chos kun stong pa nyid dag tu //
analyzed: chos kun stong pa nyid dag tu //
translated: All phenomena are emptiness,

original: shes pa'i rnal 'byor rig pa'i rgyun //
analyzed: shes pa'i rnal 'byor rig pa'i rgyun //
translated: the stream of awareness of the yoga of knowledge,

original: yi ge ma ru gnas pa dag /
analyzed: yi ge ma ru gnas pa dag /
translated: the syllable Ma resides

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng nyid du //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng nyid du //
translated: right on top of the sun maṇḍala.

original: thugs kyi yi ge bsrung ba bsam //
analyzed: thugs kyi yi ge bsrung ba bsam //
translated: One should think of the syllable of the mind as a protection

original: padma'i 'od zer bsil ba'i steng //
analyzed: padma'i 'od zer bsil ba'i steng //
translated: on top of the cool light rays of the lotus.

original: sa la rdo rje sngon po ste //
analyzed: sa la rdo rje sngon po ste //
translated: On the ground is a blue vajra,

original: spro bsdus nga @69a * //
analyzed: spro bsdus nga @69a * //
translated: which is expanded and contracted.

original: rgyal dran par bya //🔽aom dve sha ra ti badzra a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: rgyal dran par bya // aom dve sha ra ti badzra a'atma ko& ham /
translated: One should recall the king.🔽oṃ vairocana vajra-ātmāko ’haṃ

original: gyur pas rdo rje phag mo ste //🔽aindra n'i lam'i mdog 'dra ba //
analyzed: gyur pas rdo rje phag mo ste // aindra n'i lam'i mdog 'dra ba //
translated: One becomes Vajravārāhī,🔽the color of sapphire,

original: rtsa ba phag gdong rab sngo zhing //
analyzed: rtsa ba phag gdong rab sngo zhing //
translated: with a pig’s face at the root, very blue,

original: de las gzhan pa dkar dang dmar //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa dkar dang dmar //
translated: and the others white and red.

original: gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag //
analyzed: gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag //
translated: The root hands hold a flaying knife and skull cup,

original: rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo pad //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo pad //
translated: a vajra, sword, wheel, and lotus,

original: rim bzhin bkod pa'i sku mchog ni //
analyzed: rim bzhin bkod pa'i sku mchog ni //
translated: arranged in order.

original: g-yon bskum g-yas pa brkyang bas gnas //
analyzed: g-yon bskum g-yas pa brkyang bas gnas //
translated: Standing with the left leg bent and the right extended,

original: dbu dang sku ni dur khrod dang // klu yis mdzes shing phreng ba ldan //
analyzed: dbu dang sku ni dur khrod dang // klu yis mdzes shing phreng ba ldan //
translated: with a skull and garland, beautified by snakes,

original: me dpung nang na gzi brjid che //
analyzed: me dpung nang na gzi brjid che //
translated: in the midst of a bonfire, with great splendor,

original: bskyed pa gsum la rdo rje che //
analyzed: bskyed pa gsum la rdo rje che //
translated: the great vajra in the three creations,🔽the six bodhisattvas in the six places,

original: drug la byang chub sems dpa' drug / rig pa'i dbang bskur gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: drug la byang chub sems dpa' drug / rig pa'i dbang bskur gshin rje gshed //
translated: the consecration of knowledge, the slayer of Yama,

original: ye shes phag mos byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: ye shes phag mos byin gyis brlab //
translated: blessed by the wisdom sow,

original: mchod pa'i rnam 'phrul snying las sprul //
analyzed: mchod pa'i rnam 'phrul snying las sprul //
translated: the emanation of offerings emanated from the heart,

original: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
analyzed: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
translated: Akṣobhya, the great vajra wisdom,

original: zhe sdang bdag po thugs dbyer med //
analyzed: zhe sdang bdag po thugs dbyer med //
translated: the lord of hatred, indivisible from mind,

original: mi phyed rnam rtog rab gcod pa //
analyzed: mi phyed rnam rtog rab gcod pa //
translated: unbreakable, thoroughly cutting conceptualization,

original: rdo rje phag mo khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, Vajravārāhī.

original: 'phros pas snying ga'i sa bon te //
analyzed: 'phros pas snying ga'i sa bon te //
translated: The seed syllable in the heart is emanated,

original: sbyangs pa rang yid dang ba'i lhar //
analyzed: sbyangs pa rang yid dang ba'i lhar //
translated: purified, and made into the deity that delights the mind,

original: byas nas bsdu ba dag kyang bya//
analyzed: byas nas bsdu ba dag kyang bya//
translated: and then the gathering is also performed.

original: gal te skyo na gsang sngags bzlas //
analyzed: gal te skyo na gsang sngags bzlas //
translated: If one is tired, one should recite the mantra.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil nyi ste //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil nyi ste //
translated: The sun mandala of the awareness being

original: rdo rje sngags ni 'bar bar bsam //
analyzed: rdo rje sngags ni 'bar bar bsam //
translated: is imagined as the blazing vajra mantra.

original: aom dve sha ra ti badzra h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom dve sha ra ti badzra h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vairocana vajra hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: stong dang khri dang bye bar bzlas //
analyzed: stong dang khri dang bye bar bzlas //
translated: Recite a thousand, ten thousand, or a hundred thousand times.

original: sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
translated: The mantrin will attain spiritual powers.

original: rab tu zhi ba'i byang chub sems //
analyzed: rab tu zhi ba'i byang chub sems //
translated: The bodhicitta of peace

original: yi ge kha dog dbyibs kyang med //
analyzed: yi ge kha dog dbyibs kyang med //
translated: has no letters, color, or shape.

original: rnam par rtog pa kun spangs pa'i //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa kun spangs pa'i //
translated: Abandoning all conceptualization,

original: skye 'jig med pa bsgom par bya //
analyzed: skye 'jig med pa bsgom par bya //
translated: meditate on the unborn and unceasing.

original: de la rten cing 'brel 'byung ste //
analyzed: de la rten cing 'brel 'byung ste //
translated: In that, there is dependent origination.

original: phyag rgya bkrol la spyod lam bya //
analyzed: phyag rgya bkrol la spyod lam bya //
translated: Unravel the mudra and engage in daily activities.

original: aom a'a: h'um mu: //
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um mu: //
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ muḥ.

original: bdag gis rje btsun pha la rgyu rnyed pa //
analyzed: bdag gis rje btsun pha la rgyu rnyed pa //
translated: I, the venerable Phakpa, have found the cause

original: rtog bral chos sku gzugs sku snang sgrub thabs //🔽phag mo rnal 'byor ma yi sgrub thabs byas //
analyzed: rtog bral chos sku gzugs sku snang sgrub thabs // phag mo rnal 'byor ma yi sgrub thabs byas //
translated: of the dharmakāya free from conceptualization and the rūpakāya appearing,🔽and have composed this sādhana of Vajrayoginī.🔽May all who obtain virtue through this be liberated.

original: 'di yis dge thob thams cad grol gyur shog / rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'di yis dge thob thams cad grol gyur shog / rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Vajraḍāka-yoginī composed by master Dīpaṃkara is complete.
